name: Pi's Lagoon
description:
The Cycle of Rot has started again. Slowly, the interdimensional worlds ruled over by the gods will be consumed with the tainted souls unless the Host of Rot is succeeded.

You are Awoken from hibernation and quick to get on your feet to begin your pursuit of this mission.  You will meet some friends that help you along your journey . You will meet some foes who try to stop you. You will find some puzzles created to test your abilities.
